content:
I just reviewed the current state of the Task resource on https://hl7-fhir.github.io/task.html and found a strange description for the basedOn Element: pasted image
Shouldn't this be "Request fulfilled by this task" instead of "Request fulfilled by this request"?
It's not strictly a typo, it's standard verbiage, but it's standard verbiage that should be updated to be context-dependent. So yes, that change should be made. Now committed
